spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 8% of your highest secondary rating, up to 2%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 4 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Barbed Shot deals 87 additional damage over its duration, and Frenzy's duration is increased to 9.0 sec.
Bestial Wrath increases your Agility by 20 for 8 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: Focus excess Azerite energy into the Heart of Azeroth, then expel that energy outward, dealing 829 Fire damage to all enemies in front of you over 2.6 sec. Castable while moving.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Your damaging spells and abilities grant you 2 Haste for 4 sec, stacking up to 10 times. This Haste is lost if you stop using spells or abilities against the initial target.

When you have no stacks of Focused Energy, generate 3 stacks from your first damaging spell or ability.

Reduces the cooldown of Aspect of the Wild by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Aspect of the Wild, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Versatility by 1 for 14 sec, stacking up to 8 times. Being the vicitim of a loss of control or movement impairing effect also grants a stack of Strife.

Your movement speed is increased by 5%, and when you move more than 25 yds within 4 sec, gain 8 Agility for 20 sec.

This can only occur once every 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 7% of your highest secondary rating, up to 2%.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to release a barrage of lasers, dealing 71 Arcane damage split among all enemies and restoring 127 health split among injured allies.

Enables Reorigination Array within Uldir.

spells.description: Equip: Show off your truly epic brawling accomplishments.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 8% of your highest secondary rating, up to 2%.
Rapid Fire damage is increased by up to 7 per shot fired, this damage starts lower and increases per shot of Rapid Fire. Aimed Shot has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Rapid Fire.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

effects.display_string: (2) Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Barbed Shot at 100% effectiveness. Casting Bestial Wrath always hits a Jackpot!

(4) Set: Hitting a Jackpot! infuses your pet with a mutagen, causing its auto-attacks to deal 13,159 Nature damage to its target and up to 5 enemies within 10 yds for 8 sec. Mutagenic attacks reduce the cooldown of Bestial Wrath by 0.3 sec.

spells.description: Use: Engage the rocket boots to greatly increase your speed. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: You move 20% faster while piloting a mount created by an Engineer. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 17,225 Agility for 15 sec.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Use: Teleports the caster to Baradin Base Camp on Tol Barad. (4 Hr Cooldown)
